        this connector.

      • automaticReconnect

        public NatsConnector automaticReconnect(boolean automaticReconnect)
        Indicates whether a reconnect should be attempted automatically if the Nats server connection fails. Thsi value is true by default.
        Parameters:
        automaticReconnect - whether a reconnect should be attempted automatically if the Nats server connection fails.
        Returns:
        this connector.

      • eventLoopGroup

        public NatsConnector eventLoopGroup(io.netty.channel.EventLoopGroup eventLoopGroup)
        Specifies the Netty EventLoopGroup to use for connecting to the Nats server(s). (optional)
        Parameters:
        eventLoopGroup - the Netty ChannelFactory to use for connecting to the Nats server(s)
        Returns:
        this connector.

      • reconnectWaitTime

        public NatsConnector reconnectWaitTime(long time,
                              TimeUnit unit)
        Specifies the amount of time to wait between connection attempts. This is only used when automatic reconnect is enabled.
        Parameters:
        time - the amount of time to wait between connection attempts.
        unit - the time unit of the time argument
        Returns:
        this connector.

      • pedantic

        public NatsConnector pedantic(boolean pedantic)
        Indicates whether the server should do extra checking, mostly around properly formed subjects.
        Parameters:
        pedantic -
        Returns:
        this connector.

      • maxFrameSize

        public NatsConnector maxFrameSize(int maxFrameSize)
        Specified the maximum message size that can be received by the Nats instance. Defaults to 1MB.
        Parameters:
        maxFrameSize - the maximum message size that can be received by the Nats instance.
        Returns:
        this connector.

      • addConnectionStateListener

        public NatsConnector addConnectionStateListener(ConnectionStateListener listener)
        Adds a ConnectionStateListener to the client. This allows you to be notified when a connection is established, when the server is ready to process messages, and when the connection disconnects. If the connection to the server closes unexpectedly, the client will automatically try to reconnect to the Cloud Event Bus cluster.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to use
        Returns:
        this connector.

      • connect

        public Nats connect()
        Creates the Nats instance and asynchronously connects to the first Nats server provided using the #addHost methods.
        Returns:
        the Nats instance.
